metadata.title: CVE-2019-19204 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Oniguruma 6.x before 6.9.4_rc2. In the functionfetch_interval_quantifier (formerly known as fetch_range_quantifier) inregparse.c, PFETCH is called without checking PEND. This leads to aheap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: libonig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
